name: I Gotta GoMV
lyric:
我知道你只爱你自己
别以为你真的了不起
我知道你只在乎你自己
和你一起我发觉实在没道理
我不能相信太不公平不应该
'CAUSE RIGHT NOW I'VE GOTTA THINK ABOUT MY OWN LIFE
我终于明白该来的会来 'CAUSE I GOTTA GO NOW
'CAUSE I GOTTA GO NOW
I JUST GOTTA GO' CAN'T DEAL WITH YOU NO MORE
I HAVE HAD ENOUGH OF YOUR CRAZY STUFF
I JUST GOTTA GO 不能再忍受 I JUST GOTTA GO 绝对不回头
别以为我笨的可以
以後请你多多照顾自己
我浪费太多时间陪你
这一次我将会比你更狠心
YOU DECIDED TO CHANGE TO
PLEASE THOSE FOOLS GUESS WHO'S TO BLAME?
BUT BEFORE YOU BEGIN TO GET CARRIED AWAY
I GOT SOMETHIN' TO SAY TO YOU MY WAY MY WAY
I LEARNED IN THE LAST PAST MONTHS AND WEEKS
THAT YOU AIN'T NO DIFFERENT FROM ALL OF THOSE GEEKS
ACTUALLY' AS A MATTER-OF-FACT
GEEK WAS A COMPLIMENT I HOPE YOU GOT THAT
I KNOW AND YOU KNOW THAT YOU'RE JUST A FOOL
SELFISH AND EGOTISICAL TRYIN' TO ACT COOL
YOU AIN'T NOTHIN' IF YOU THINK YOU'RE EVERYTHIN'
YA CHANGED' BROTHA YOU DIDN'T USED TO BE SO MEAN
AND WHEN YOUR TIME COMES AND YOU CAN TREAT ME COOL
I MIGHT BE BACK BUT NOW I GOTTA GO
AND WHEN YOUR TIME COMES AND YOU CAN TREAT ME COOL
I STILL GOTTA GO-FOOL!
I JUST GOTTA GO CAN'T DEAL WITH YOU NO MORE
I HAVE HAD ENOUGH OF YOUR CRAZY STUFF
I JUST GOTTA GO 不能再忍受 I JUST GOTTA GO 绝对不回头
I JUST GOTTA GO CAN'T DEAL WITH YOU NO MORE
I HAVE HAD ENOUGH OF YOUR CRAZY STUFF
I JUST GOTTA GO 不能再忍受 I JUST GOTTA GO 绝对不回头
I JUST GOTTA GO CAN'T DEAL WITH YOU NO MORE
I HAVE HAD ENOUGH OF YOUR CRAZY STUFF
I JUST GOTTA GO 不能再忍受 I JUST GOTTA GO

comments.brief:
留脚印03年听一下午的歌

来自iPhone客户端
